pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonnegative Integer Solutions of Linear Diophantine Equations with Applications // Routines for enumerating all existing nonnegative integer solutions of a linear Diophantine equation. The package provides routines for solving 0-1, bounded and unbounded knapsack problems; 0-1, bounded and unbounded subset sum problems; additive partitioning of natural numbers; and one-dimensional bin-packing problem.
